metadata.description: Complete database export from Product Feature Readiness Database

product_features.name: Terberg: Driver-in operations (semi-trailer)
product_features.description: Forward only operations with driver in vehicle towing a trailer.
product_features.label: baseline
product_features.tmos: Complete 500 consecutive operations with 99.5% safety record

product_features.name: Terberg: Driver-Out, AV only, FWD
product_features.description: Forward only operations with no driver in vehicle, towing a trailer
product_features.label: PF-AUTO-1.1
product_features.tmos: Achieve 1000 hours autonomous operation with <0.1 disengagement rate

product_features.name: Platooning
product_features.description: Multiple vehicles can follow each other closely in automated convoy
product_features.label: PF-ADV-2.1
product_features.tmos: Demonstrate 3-vehicle platoon for 100km with 15% fuel savings

product_features.name: Remote Vehicle Operation
product_features.description: Vehicle can be operated remotely by a human operator
product_features.label: PF-REM-1.0
product_features.tmos: Control vehicle remotely with <200ms latency for 8-hour shifts

product_features.name: Cargo Handling Automation
product_features.description: Automated loading and unloading of cargo
product_features.label: PF-AUTO-3.0
product_features.tmos: Automate 95% of cargo handling operations without human intervention

product_features.name: Fleet Management
product_features.description: Centralized management and coordination of vehicle fleets
product_features.label: PF-MGMT-1.0
product_features.tmos: Manage 50+ vehicle fleet with 99% uptime and optimal routing

capabilities.name: Autonomous Terminal Operations
capabilities.success_criteria: Vehicle can perform fully autonomous operations in terminal environment including navigation, cargo handling coordination, and safe interaction with infrastructure and personnel
capabilities.tmos: Successfully complete 100 consecutive autonomous terminal operations with 99.9% safety record and 95% efficiency compared to human operators

capabilities.name: Highway Platooning
capabilities.success_criteria: Multiple vehicles can operate in close formation on highways with automated following and coordination
capabilities.tmos: Demonstrate stable 3-vehicle platoon maintaining 10m spacing at 80km/h for 100km duration with 15% fuel savings

capabilities.name: Urban Delivery Operations
capabilities.success_criteria: Autonomous vehicle can navigate urban environments and complete delivery tasks including parking, cargo access, and pedestrian interaction
capabilities.tmos: Complete 50 urban delivery routes with 98% on-time delivery rate and zero safety incidents involving pedestrians or cyclists

capabilities.name: Remote Monitoring and Control
capabilities.success_criteria: Human operators can monitor and control autonomous vehicles from remote operations center with full situational awareness
capabilities.tmos: Achieve 200ms maximum latency for control commands and 99.5% uptime for monitoring systems across 50 vehicle fleet

technical_functions.name: Perception System
technical_functions.description: Camera, LiDAR, and radar sensor fusion for environment perception
technical_functions.success_criteria: Successfully detect and classify 99.9% of relevant objects within 100m range in all weather conditions

technical_functions.name: Path Planning
technical_functions.success_criteria: Generate collision-free paths in real-time for complex terminal environments
technical_functions.tmos: Plan optimal paths with <100ms computation time for 95% of scenarios

technical_functions.name: Vehicle Control
technical_functions.description: Precise control of steering, acceleration, and braking
technical_functions.success_criteria: Maintain vehicle trajectory within 10cm accuracy at all operational speeds
technical_functions.tmos: Execute control commands with <20ms response time and ±5cm precision

technical_functions.name: Localization
technical_functions.success_criteria: Achieve centimeter-level positioning accuracy in GPS-denied environments
technical_functions.tmos: Maintain <5cm positioning accuracy 99% of the time

technical_functions.name: Detect proximal humans
technical_functions.description: Switch to SAFESTATE when a human violates buffer
technical_functions.success_criteria: Detect humans within 5m safety buffer and trigger emergency stops within 200ms
technical_functions.tmos: 100% detection rate for humans in safety zones with <200ms response

technical_functions.name: Traffic Light Recognition
technical_functions.description: Detection and interpretation of traffic signals
technical_functions.success_criteria: Accurately identify and respond to all standard traffic signals from 50m distance
technical_functions.tmos: 99.5% accuracy in traffic signal detection and classification

technical_functions.name: Pedestrian Detection
technical_functions.success_criteria: Detect and track pedestrians in all lighting and weather conditions
technical_functions.tmos: 99.9% pedestrian detection rate with <1% false positives

technical_functions.name: Intersection Handling
technical_functions.success_criteria: Navigate intersections with mixed traffic including pedestrians and cyclists
technical_functions.tmos: Complete intersection traversals with 100% safety record

technical_functions.name: Parking Space Detection
technical_functions.success_criteria: Identify and evaluate parking spaces suitable for vehicle dimensions
technical_functions.tmos: Detect 95% of available parking spaces with accurate size assessment

technical_functions.name: Low-Speed Maneuvering
technical_functions.success_criteria: Execute complex parking maneuvers in tight spaces with centimeter precision
technical_functions.tmos: Successfully park in spaces with <50cm clearance on each side

technical_functions.name: Vehicle-to-Vehicle Communication
technical_functions.success_criteria: Maintain reliable communication between vehicles in platoon formation
technical_functions.tmos: 99.9% communication reliability with <50ms latency between vehicles

technical_functions.name: Convoy Formation
technical_functions.description: Automatic formation and maintenance of vehicle convoys
technical_functions.success_criteria: Form and maintain multi-vehicle convoys with automated spacing control

technical_functions.name: Teleoperation Interface
technical_functions.success_criteria: Provide intuitive control interface for remote vehicle operation
technical_functions.tmos: Enable remote operation with <200ms control latency

technical_functions.name: Low-Latency Communication
technical_functions.success_criteria: Maintain stable communication link between vehicle and operations center

technical_functions.name: Robotic Loading System
technical_functions.success_criteria: Automate cargo loading and securing processes without human intervention
technical_functions.tmos: Load 95% of standard cargo types autonomously in <10 minutes

technical_functions.name: Cargo Tracking
technical_functions.success_criteria: Monitor cargo location, condition, and security throughout transport
technical_functions.tmos: Provide real-time cargo status with 99% accuracy

technical_functions.name: Route Optimization
technical_functions.description: Dynamic route planning for multiple vehicles
technical_functions.success_criteria: Optimize routes for fleet efficiency considering traffic and cargo priorities
technical_functions.tmos: Reduce total fleet travel time by 15% compared to manual planning

technical_functions.name: Vehicle Health Monitoring
technical_functions.success_criteria: Monitor vehicle health and predict maintenance needs
technical_functions.tmos: Predict 90% of maintenance needs 48 hours in advance
